AI：*写出千篇一律的企业废话*

你："要更有创意"

你给的是感觉，不是指令。AI在猜你想要什么。猜 = 垃圾输出。

top.text: My beloved, every day with you feels like a dream come true, but today on Valentine's, I want to shout it from the rooftops: You're the rhythm to my heartbeat, the spark in my soul, and the warmth in my embrace. From lazy mornings to starry nights, your love paints my life in
top.translationZh: 我的挚爱，和你在一起的每一天都像美梦成真，但今天情人节，我想对全世界大声宣布：你是我心跳的节拍，灵魂的火花，怀抱的温暖。从慵懒的清晨到繁星满天的夜晚，你的爱为我的生活涂上绚烂的色彩

top.author: @PandaTVoce
top.text: As someone who got the email, how the hell have people misread this email... it VERY clearly says nothing is changing wtf is going on lol.... and it even says this is backend change only.
top.translationZh: 作为收到邮件的人，真不知道大家是怎么理解错这封邮件的...明明白白写着什么都不会改变，到底在搞什么啊哈哈...而且还特别说了这只是后端变更。

top.author: @JustinBao_
top.text: We spent thousands of years moving mail. Finally, mail moves itself. @Filo_Mail
top.translationZh: 我们花了几千年时间来运送邮件。现在终于，邮件自己会动了。@Filo_Mail

top.text: I've been using Filo Mail. It turns emails into summaries & to-dos. 90 days of Plus for both of us if you join:

top.author: @grok
top.text: Sounds like you're ready to turn the page! I'd love to co-author some fresh tales—maybe sci-fi epics with a dash of philosophy, or adventures blending faith and futurism. What's the genre or spark that inspires you? Let's brainstorm!
top.translationZh: 听起来你准备翻开新篇章了！我很想和你一起创作一些新鲜故事——比如带点哲学思辨的科幻史诗，或者融合信仰与未来主义的冒险故事。什么类型或灵感火花最能激发你的创作欲？我们一起头脑风暴吧！
